ygData.subject: Changes in spawning
ygData.msgSnippet: I have hunted the Shrine in LF a lot and I have noticed a difference their last night. One the mummies and skeletons (lvl 9-13)have a lot more booty. I made
ygData.messageBody:
I have hunted the Shrine in LF a lot and I have noticed a difference their
last night. One the mummies and skeletons (lvl 9-13)have a lot more booty. I
made several plat in an hour. HOWEVER there was a spawn variation last
night. Normally I just take them in rotation and they spawn about every 5
mins. Once last night a 2nd mummy spawned about 10 seconds after I pulled
the first. Has anyone noticed this. Personally I really like the idea as it
changed a "cushy" kill into a near death experience. I look forward to
hearing your thoughts.

Nyne/Nynenom
